subject: Olympic Games (2012)
News and News Media
Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
Newspapers
lead_paragraph: The shuttering of The News of the World due to the phone-hacking scandal may leave Rupert Murdoch’s other British newspapers without exclusive access to the country’s Olympians.
snippet: The shuttering of The News of the World due to the phone-hacking scandal may leave Rupert Murdoch’s other British newspapers without exclusive access to the country’s Olympians.
